TopicTitle: Any landing you walk away from . . .

Articles.Content: My buddy and I were trying to thread the needle at KSC when I pulled out the most disastrous victory ever.
That's what I call "crashing with style"! Was that Jeb I saw gloating in the aftermath?

Had similar happen when trying to bridge-dash. (fly through that bridge and under every overhang in a jet) I've yet to manage all the way, but the failures are spectacular. Even had one where I landed the Kerbal on the helipads cause the cockpit got launched.

Sadly, I don't run recording software, and I forget to screenshot when I'm laughing at the hilarity of fail.
BadS! I love this indifferent expression on Kerbal's face, while his capsule is hurling through the air: "Meh. Plenty of time to do something."
This was on Reddit a few days ago:

Had similar happen when trying to bridge-dash. (fly through that bridge and under every overhang in a jet) I've yet to manage all the way, but the failures are spectacular. Even had one where I landed the Kerbal on the helipads cause the cockpit got launched.

Sadly, I don't run recording software, and I forget to screenshot when I'm laughing at the hilarity of fail.

If you're looking to start recording, give OBS a look. It's free and it works great.

Open Broadcast Software.

This was on Reddit a few days ago:

That's pretty insane. I'm thinking of design revisions so I can survive the tunnel WITH my jet and compact is obviously ideal.
The only way that could be better is if he'd landed on the helicopter pad!
